#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

bool check(int n) {
	int temp = n;
	int ans = 0;
	while(temp) {
		ans = ans*10 + temp%10;
		temp /= 10;
	}
	if(n == ans) {
		return 1;
	}
	return 0;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	int n;
	while(t--) {
		cin>>n;
		for(int i = n + 1; i <= 99999; i++) {
			if(check(i)) {
				cout<<i<<"\n";
				break;
			}
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
